conversion_verification.notes: The 2D plan has been successfully converted into an isometric 3D cutaway model with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; walls show consistent height and thickness. Perspective is stable.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room configuration and wall placement. Balcony/Deck areas are correctly translated as open-air segments.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the original plan, including specific seating arrangements and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render. Deducted minor points for slightly dark lighting in the utility/storage hallway.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window frames compared to the detailed sliding door notation in the 2D deck area.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that meticulously preserves the layout, furniture arrangement, and spatial proportions of the original 2D architectural plan.
